title: Adad Gate
description: The Adad Gate is one of Babylon's eight city gates and it is situated on the western side of the inner city, directly west of the nu-x-ù quarter. King Nebuchadnezzar II built the gate ca. 575 B.C.

properties.description: The proposed location of the Adad Gate is based on a plan of the ruins of Babylon, with 500 m UTM coordinates.
properties.title: Proposed location of the Adad Gate
